title: 5 ways to cook with tofu - for meat-eaters and vegetarians
summary: Tofu is an incredibly versatile food that can be used in a wide variety of recipes. It's an ideal ingredient that you can use in many different ways to make a vegan dish. Marinating tofu before cooking it will make it even more flavorful. Grilling or broiling tofu will give it a nice crunch on the outside while keeping it soft and creamy on the inside. You can serve tofu with a variety of sauces, including barbecue sauce, teriyaki sauce, or a simple mixture of soy sauce and lemon or lime juice.
